ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Win the Case (Negotiate)"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Handover (Prepare for Delivery)"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Execute (Start Delivery)"), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName , "Completed") ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( AND( !ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(G4_Approval_Date__c )), ISCHANGED( G4_Approval_Date__c ), G4_Approval_Date__c != DATEVALUE( Opportunity__r.G4_Approval_Date__c ) ), AND( ISCHANGED(LOA_Bypass__c), TEXT(Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c )!='Fast Track Opportunity', OR( Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only_Indirect' ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: G4 Approval Date and G4/G5 Bypass offer condition are fixed and cannot be edited manually.
